  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>62efeb89-86cf-440f-a354-4efda6c91e07#1#6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A tömeg mérése</string>
            <string language="en">Measuring of weight</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messen des Gewichts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mesure du poids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Medição do peso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Misurazione del peso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέτρηση του βάρους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El medir del peso</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tömeg és az erő mértékegysége, a tömeg mérése (dinamikai és sztatikai)</string>
            <string language="en">The unit of measure of the weight and power, the measuring of weight (dynamical and statictical)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">erőtörvények,  tömeg,  erő,  tömegmérés,  </string>
            <string language="en">power rules, weight, power, weight measuring,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Maßeinheit des Masses des Gewichts und der 
Energie, das Messen des Gewichts (dynamisch und statictical)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'unité de mesure du poids et de la puissance, la 
mesure du poids (dynamique et statictical)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A unidade de medida do peso e da potência, a 
medição do peso (dinâmico e statictical)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'unità della misura del peso e dell'potenza, la 
misurazione del peso (dinamico e statictical)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μονάδα του μέτρου του βάρους και της δύναμης, η 
μέτρηση του βάρους (δυναμικός και statictical)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La unidad de la medida del peso y de la potencia, 
el medir del peso (dinámico y statictical)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schalten Sie Richtlinien, Gewicht, Energie an, das 
messende Gewicht,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">actionnez les règles, poids, puissance, poids mesurant,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">power réguas, peso, potência, peso que mede,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">alimenti le regole, il peso, l'potenza, peso che misura,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κανόνες δύναμης, βάρος, δύναμη, βάρος που μετρούν,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">accione las reglas, peso, potencia, peso que mide,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>978</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
